mapper.select: SELECT pno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, up_date FROM post WHERE pno = #{pno} ORDER BY pno asc
SELECT t1.title, t1.bno FROM board t1, post t2 WHERE t1.bno = t2.bno AND pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (pno, bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{pno}, #{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, 0, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('P', LPAD(CAST(SUBSTR(MAX(PNO),2,5) AS UNSIGNED) +1,4,0)) FROM POST
